name: Oddbods Live Coloring (AR)
description:
Now you can color and play 7 amazing mini-games with your favorite Oddbods characters as they come to life right in front of you!

The Official Oddbods Live Coloring app combines traditional coloring with Augmented Reality technology, bringing your coloring sheets to life exactly the way you colored them in! Immerse yourself into a magical experience you have never experienced before with Pogo, Fuse, Newt, Slick, Bubbles, Jeff, and Zee!

You can find and download and print the Oddbods coloring sheets for free from our website:http://bit.ly/coloroddbods

The official Oddbods Live Coloring app is COMPLETELY FREE and has NO ADVERTISEMENTS!

Use any art supplies you'd like to color in the coloring sheets. Download and open the Oddbods Live Coloring app and point your camera at the coloring sheet you colored in, and your creation will pop right out of the sheet and into the real world, appearing exactly the way you colored it in!

The Augmented Reality technology allows you to combine the fun of traditional coloring with amazing digital mini-games!

Features
- Enjoy the fun of traditional physical coloring combined with a fantastic Augmented Reality experience.

- Color the Oddbods characters and bring them to life on the screen of your smart device, appearing precisely the way you colored them in.

- Includes all the main characters from the global 3D animation TV show hit Oddbods, with Pogo, Fuse, Newt, Slick, Bubbles, Jeff and Zee.

- Interact with your Oddbods friends and play seven unique mini-games. Share your high scores and compete on the Leaderboards with your friends and family.

- Take screenshots of your live colorings and share them with your friends and family on social networks!

How to start:

- Download the official Oddbods Live Coloring app

- Visit "http://bit.ly/coloroddbods" to download and print out the coloring sheets

- Color your favorite character using any art supplies, from crayons to watercolor paint

- Open the app and point the camera at the coloring sheet and experience the magic!

- Move your smart device to see the character from any angle and tap on the screen to play mini-games and have fun!

If you are experiencing difficulties bringing your colorings to life or would like to provide us with feedback, please feel free to contact us by email: info@maysalward.com

Before you download this, please consider that this app will request access to your device’s camera needed to enable the Augmented Reality experience.
